meanings.sent1: The twins looked nonidentical with one having curly hair and the other having straight hair.
meanings.sent2: The two houses on the street were nonidentical in color, one was blue and the other was yellow.
meanings.sent3: It was quite amusing to see the nonidentical socks he wore, one was striped and the other was polka-dotted.
meanings.sent4: Their nonidentical personalities clashed like oil and water, always causing arguments.
meanings.sent5: The nonidentical shapes of the clouds made the sky look like a painting.

meanings.sent1: The nonidentical sizes of the shoes made it hard to find a pair that fit perfectly.
meanings.sent2: Her nonidentical earrings were a fashion statement, one was a hoop and the other was a stud.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see the nonidentical heights of the students in the class photo.
meanings.sent4: The nonidentical speeds of the cars on the highway created a chaotic traffic jam.
meanings.sent5: The nonidentical flavors of the ice cream cones delighted their taste buds.
